Text: Learning is not compulsory...neither is survival.
Author: Dr. W. Edwards Deming

Text: People don't buy what you do; they buy why you do it. And what you do simply proves what you believe.
Author: Simon Sinek

Text: Don't take care of your career. Take care of your people. They will take care of your career.
Author: Jim Collins

Text: The single biggest problem in communication is the illusion that it has taken place.
Author: George Bernard Shaw

Text: People are not disturbed by things, but by the views they take of them.
Author: Epictetus

Text: When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive - to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love.
Author: Marcus Aurelius
